#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {


    int n,m;
    cin>>n>>m;

    int arr[n][m];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        for(int j=0;j<m;j++)
    {
        cin>>arr[i][j];
    }
    int i=0;
    int j=0;
    int count=0;
    while(!((arr[i][j+1]==INT_MAX||j==m-1)&&(arr[i+1][j]==INT_MAX||i==n-1)))
    {

        if( (i==n-1)||(j<m-1&&i<n-1&&(arr[i][j+1]<arr[i+1][j])))
        {
            arr[i][j]=arr[i][j+1];
            j++;
        count++;
        }
        else if ( (j==m-1)||(j<m-1&&i<n-1&&(arr[i][j+1]>arr[i+1][j])))
        {
            arr[i][j]=arr[i+1][j];
            i++;
        count++;
        }

    }
    cout<<count<<endl;




    }

    return 0;
}
